Package com.saxonica.xsltextn

This package contains classes used at compile time to support extensions to XSLT beyond 2.0: both facilities in the working draft of XSLT 3.0, and extensions specific to Saxon.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    ExtensionElementFactory
    Interface ExtensionElementFactory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TypeAliasManagerPE
    Manager for saxon:type-alias declarations in a stylesheet.

Package com.saxonica.xsltextn Description

This package contains classes used at compile time to support extensions to XSLT beyond 2.0: both facilities in the working draft of XSLT 3.0, and extensions specific to Saxon.

These classes are generally implementations of StyleElement, representing elements on the stylesheet tree. They are instantiated using the factory class com.saxonica.xsltextn.StyleNodeFactoryPE or com.saxonica.xsltextn.SaxonElementFactoryEE as appropriate.

Michael H. Kay
Saxonica Limited
30 July 2010
